begs.name: Markiplier
comments: "Here's {thing}, don't spend it all on FNAF merchandise!"
"Your joke was so funny, I laughed my {thing} off. Now it's yours, no take-backs."
"I'm in such a good mood, I'm giving you {thing}. No, it's not because I finally beat Dark Souls."
"I like your style, so here's {thing}. It's not a pink mustache, but it'll do."
"You're so brave, you deserve this {thing}. It's not a Warfstache, but it's something."

begs.name: PewDiePie
comments: "Your request was so amusing, I'm giving you {thing}. That's more than I earned from my first Minecraft video."
"Impressed by your creativity, here's {thing}. It's not a PewDiePie chair, but it'll do."
"Appreciate your support, so here's {thing}. It's not a brofist, but it's close."
"I like your determination, so here's {thing}. It's not a diamond play button, but it's shiny."
"Moved by your story, I'm giving you {thing}. It's not a pet tambourine, but it'll help."
